cmput301f13t10.presenter

Class AdventurePresenter

  • java.lang.Object
    • cmput301f13t10.presenter.AdventurePresenter

  • public class AdventurePresenter
extends java.lang.Object
    A Presenter that relays data between the adventure model and the adventure view. This class creates new adventure models or loads them from the cache.
    Author:
    Braeden Soetaert

      Returns the title of the currently loaded adventure model.
      java.util.List<SectionTitle> getSectionTitles()
      Gets the section title, id and whether or not it is the start section for every section in the current adventure.

      Sets the title for the currently loaded adventure title.
